website_summaries.verdict: Uses wireless technology to connect camera and display screen. Top-of-the-line performance and feature set.
pros: Works from minus-4-degrees Fahrenheit to plus-149-degrees Fahrenheit and has good low-light performance
Suction cup for screen or dash mounting
cons: Picture quality can be inconsistent, particularly on longer vehicles

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Easy To Install!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Auto-VOX CS-2 for my 2014 Ram 1500. The installation was a breeze. The directions in the package were very easy to follow, and in 45-minutes I had the system completely installed. I positioned the camera above the license plate. The video on the monitor is high quality. As soon as I put my gear shift in Reverse the monitor comes on and gives me a clear display behind the truck. Now I can see everything that is behind me to make backing-up much easier and safer. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Framel

customer_reviews.title: back up camera for fifth wheel
customer_reviews.text: I installed this unit on a 40 foot fifth wheel to watch my boat when I tow it and am just tickled to death when I plugged into the truck and turned on the clearance light. It is a nice sharp picture. I have been looking for one of these for the last 4 years and the good quality ones were around 400 bucks and when I saw the price of this one at only 119. I sent an e mail to the manufacture and he said it will works on my fifth wheel. I give this product a high thumbs up. Jack
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty clear but better field of view would be nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy install on 3/4 ton truck. To see the ball of the hitch you have to mount fairly low like near top of back license plate. So when you have it that high to see down to the hitch ball you only see 15 feet or so behind the truck. If you mount it lower you will be in the middle of the license plate. Hooking it up to the tail gate like a factory unit is not plausible due to the wiring. Still all in all worth it especially for hooking up a trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Tree Farmer

customer_reviews.title: savior of old car
customer_reviews.text: My 2013 mini cooper doesn't have a backup camera.Found this one from Amazon.easy to install just follow YouTube .they have the same brand. I have installed it by myself only took around an hour .it works great . the screen is crystal clear, slightly fuzzy at night but still clear and easy to see. Awesome product it is really helped
customer_reviews.author: Jerry zhang

customer_reviews.title: Easy to follow instructions for instalation
customer_reviews.text: I installed the backup camera without any problems. It worked on first try. Included in the kit were two clips that made the connection to the back up lights easy without stripping the wires. They just clip onto the wire, insert the backup camera wires and clamp together until it snaps into place. The camera picture was clear and the lines in the picture makes easy parking. There is plenty of wire length for easy hookup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Installed on 2004 Toyota Tundra
customer_reviews.text: I selected this unit over others because it said it would work on a pickup. The user manual, which I actually ready before beginning, says to beware of metal barriers between the antenna and the display, so I was concerned. Turns out it works great on my truck. Toyota made this easy. The camera is on the license plate, and doesn't interfere with the tailgate. The wiring was easy to run up into the left taillight and secure along the way with the nylon ties. Behind the taillight is a good watertight location, and connecting it to the reverse light was simple with the connectors provided. Picture quality is very impressive, and I'm very pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: David Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I was Looking For! Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a great quality wireless camera to install on rear of my box trailer, that would allow me to use on multiple trucks when pulling my box trailer. THANKS to AUTO VOX I not only found one, THEY made it Possible with Quality and Excellent Product!!!! I have to say, Customer Service is AMAZING!! Issues with 1st Camera, they sent replacement out with in 2 days! Once installed, it worked PERFECT! Pictures show more than words can saw... 5 Stars Hands Down!!!! Thanks for Quality Customer Service and Quality Product!!!!! Dave SLC, Utah
customer_reviews.author: David Workman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but took me longer to install!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality screen and material! I purchased this wireless back up kit for my Toyota Camry that didn’t come with a back up camera monitor. My car currently has a high set trunk so I have a lot of blind spots in my car. Backing up is now a breeze to do. However I found the installation was pretty difficult. I couldn’t do it myself so I had to hire someone to do it. Overall the quality is great except for glare from headlights at night time. Night vision without any outside lights from any other headlights is great though. I highly recommend this product but just be aware and ready for a difficult installation.
customer_reviews.author: ruby nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my new car!
customer_reviews.text: My husband just bought a car for me last month and have been wanting to get this back-up camera for the backing up since im really having difficulty with it.I am a beginner and still practicing to driveto get a license soon. So eventually this back up camera is a must,a huge help and diffinitely a savior for me.It comes wit complete acessories which are very easy to set up in the car.My husband did all the work for me. Gladly it turn out well! I am very satisfied and happy with my purchase and that i found this product which suits my budget and very good quality.The camera is very accurate! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Splendid02

customer_reviews.title: Monitor quit working after less than 10 hours use.
customer_reviews.text: Monitor quit working after about 10 uses. Less than 10 hours total use. Power plug red light is on, red power light on monitor is off. Screen is dark. AUTO VOX offered to replace the camera. By then I had traded vehicles to get a good backup camera & didn’t need a replacement. AUTO VOX sent me a dashcam with gps instead.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Misleading to say built in transmitter.
customer_reviews.text: I feel mislead by the description of "What’s more, because the transmitter is cleverly designed inside the camera". Well, the one I received clearly has a separate transmitter with its own antenna that the camera plugs into. I also had hoped the picture quality would be much clearer since its 'digital', but I still found it a little distorted. Overall its a fair camera, but I feel a little mislead by the advertising, and for the cost it should perform better. I'd return it but am outside of the 30 day window.
customer_reviews.author: Craftsman

customer_reviews.title: Clear picture, no interference, easy instal
customer_reviews.text: I have a 16ft enclosed trailer on which I wanted a back up camera, both for parking but also highway travel. In short this was a perfect choice. I "upgraded" trailer by converting it to a 7 way standard pigtail, intalling a hub inside with 12v battery to operate interior lighting, electric jack etc. I hard wired this camera and back up lighting switched by wireless remote. Picture is excellent, clear, no interference. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mack Giver

customer_reviews.title: Not for a full sized truck
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sons Ford F-150 - like one in advertised pictures. Installation was easy - unfortunately monitor would not connect to camera from inside cab - I had to take it outside for it to connect. When put back in cab it wouldn’t connect - I called tech support - 30 min spent however rep was obviously not from an English speaking country so most of conversation was what country is Oklahoma City in and did u connect red wire to red wire. Maybe good for a car but definitely out of range for pickup.
customer_reviews.author: Brendon

customer_reviews.title: Reception is not good enough
customer_reviews.text: This camera would have got 5 stars if it would stay connected. Will freeze about every second or two which makes it untrustable when backing. I have a 39ft fifthwheel and a short bed truck. Picture was okish wasn’t great but good enough for backing up
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Sundermeyer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product with GREAT customer service
customer_reviews.text: I received this product and installed it right away. I was very happy and then I quickly noticed the picture quality began to worsen. Soon the camera stopped working completely. I contacted customer service and after a few questions we determined it was the camera and transmitter. They said it would be a month or so to just get the camera sent out but we’re willing to send me a complete kit to use what I needed and send the rest back. I was very impressed with the service and the camera is working great now. Very happy overall and would recommend this product to anyone. Excellent communication and customer service!!!
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Not a great buy because it doesn’t work for long.
customer_reviews.text: Had it on my jeep for 2 days and worked perfect! then stopped working. the monitor worked (could tell bc my charger still worked) but the camera didn’t. i looked at the wires for the camera and everything and it wouldn’t work anymore. thankfully i can send it back and get my money back. :-) so upset but i’m now use to driving without one so whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Cross

customer_reviews.title: WIFI is great.
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on my 2004 SSR. It was easy to install since it uses WIFI to communicate between the camera and the display. My biggest disappointment is the size of the monitor. I am used to my Buick which has a much larger display. 4.3" is just too small. I have set the display to maximum brightness, which is fine if it is sunny, but not quite bright enough on a cloudy day. Also, the camera only has a 140 degree view. It should be around 170 degrees
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for making a good product!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why people disregard the picture quality...you aren't trying to read stop signs backwards! Clear even in rain and nighttime with reverse lights to illuminate the rear of vehicle and give you a good line of sight behind you. It took a while to cut wires back enough to make connection...we were hesitant to expose too much wire. But we used plenty of electrical tape to close and seal off the connection to keep water out. Been using the camera no trouble for about a month. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: trk family

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done, not overall impressed
customer_reviews.text: It’s definitely on the pricier end as far as back up cameras go, but having it be wireless is a lot easier to install than running a wire from the rear of your car to the front. The image quality is okay and there is a half second delay on the camera. It did not come with anything to attach the wires to the reversing light, so you will have to buy that separately. Overall, it gets the job done, but for as much as I paid for it I wish it included everything I needed to install, had better picture quality and didn’t have a delay
customer_reviews.author: Josh And Katie

customer_reviews.title: I am not sure .. maybe mount it under the car?
customer_reviews.text: It was not to bad to install. The picture was not perfect but usable. Monitor is lil bulky and will jump of its mount. The camera is alot longer then it looks, it is really obvious on the back of the truck, but i just needed it to make hitching up faster. Yesterday i went thru the carwash instead of handwashing and after i had the camera hanging there in pieces.. Update: i contacted the company directly and they are sending a new camera.
customer_reviews.author: Dave_2500hd

customer_reviews.title: Not the best picture when moving
customer_reviews.text: When your moving fast backing , the picture is choppy where its slow updating.. But I bought it for hooking up to a trailer. not for backing out the driveway.. If I used it for that, it would have gone back.. Also the suction cup mount is worthless.. Mines is held in place on the dash with double stick tape.. It wouldn't even sit a day in place with the suction cup on the glass.. Typical China crap.. Wish I could have bought USA products
customer_reviews.author: L Gerling

customer_reviews.title: Works Fantastic. Customer Service Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: We had issues with the original unit. We were met with a most helpful assistant who helped us trouble shoot the System, but our efforts were met with negative results. Within a few days, Joanne had shipped an exchange unit that worked awesome. I cannot thank Joanne enough for her professionalism. This is an Incredable Value. The night view is excellent. The back up lane markings on the screen make backing up quick and accurate. Thank you sincerely.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Installed on 2003 Tundra truck
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price with a reasonably clear picture and very little distortion. I mounted the transformer and transmitter in the enclosed taillight section of the truck out of the weather and have no problems with transmission to the monitor . I also wired in a waterproof plug connector to the camera wiring for ease of removal if anything goes wrong with the camera . All wiring connections were soldered and shrink tubing covered and overall I would say this system is going to be a helpful addition when backing .
customer_reviews.author: Greg Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Installed in 2013 Mini Cooper Countryman. Works great!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the unit is very good for the price. The picture quality is excellent. The screen is small compared to the typical built in of current models but very adequate. Installation was (for me in my particular car) quite difficult. This had nothing to do with the camera but rather the vehicle. I ordered and used a cup holder type phone mount rather than the suction mount provided.
customer_reviews.author: Old Wizard

customer_reviews.title: A high quality Backup Camera
customer_reviews.text: I am glad to purchase this Backup Camera which is really high performance and great quality. My car is old and without a backup camera. On the other hand, my skill of backup is quite poor, as a result, this item is quite helpful for me. The instruction is detailed and makes the installation work much easier than I thought. The angles are wide, and the picture is vivid and clear. And the waterproof function is also a nice bonus for myself. Like to enjoy the convenience this camera offers to me.
customer_reviews.author: Sun and  moon

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Excellent Customer Service!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product so I could see whats behind me when I am pulling my pop-up camper. After the easy installation it absolutely fit my need. Unfortunately I did not attach the antenna module securely and it fell off and dragged on the pavement and was ruined by the time I was able to look. I contacted the Customer Service division of AUTO-VOX and explained to Joanne my dilemma and she sent me out a replacement immediately. I installed the replacement and everything is perfect again. I can't tell you how nice it is to buy a product that does what it is advertised to do and then they back it up by a great service after the sale.
customer_reviews.author: MARK HAMILTON

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to install. Found the hot wire for the back up light, hooked it into the hot wire on the camera, used a self tapping screw for the ground, presto the camera works!!!!!! Now I don't have to continually hop out of the truck to line up the ball under the hitch. Mounted the screen on the dash next to the drivers door, it is out of the way enough not to block my view of the road. The total time of installation was approx. 35 minutes .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the resolution
customer_reviews.text: Update: I am going to update my star rating to 4/5 from 3/5. Customer service contacted me and worked very hard to make things right with me. I appreciated that effort. I didn't realize how bad the resolution on the camera was going to be. In this day and age you would expect at least 720P, but it's much less. I'm also not happy with the 110 degree image. I thought that would be good, and it is OK, but a wider angle would be nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great after-market product
customer_reviews.text: My last car came with factory installed backup camera and when my new one didn’t, I bought the Auto-Vox. Installation was tricky because my Mini Cooper has very few spaces through which wires could pass, but it was worth the effort. The picture is much clearer than my previous system. The screen was easy to locate without obstructing my view. Excellent resolution, very reasonable price, a most worthwhile purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joodly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very well thought out and designed. I installed on a 2017 Jeep Wrangler camera between the spokes of the rear mounted spare tire. Challenge was getting to the right rear tail light to tap into the back up light circuit. The bundle of wires from the tail gate goes in and up under the snap in/out plastic trim. Done and soldered the wires. The rest was easy as pie. I would give it 110% for a grade!!
customer_reviews.author: BGeorge

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband for Christmas not knowing anything about this product and only going off of reviews. I was worried about the quality of the camera but after getting it hooked up to his truck I was amazed at how clear it was. It worked perfectly. It took a little longer to install then we expected but overall, it was pretty simple. We would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Hackney

customer_reviews.title: Installation not quick
customer_reviews.text: Installation was not easy. Most all the reviews said it was quick and easy, it took my husband about an hour to install. The camera picture quality is excellent. Mounting for the video monitor does not hold. We will need to find another way to mount it. I bought this for my husband to make hooking up our bumper pull horse trailer easier.
customer_reviews.author: bkh

customer_reviews.title: Glad we made this purchase
customer_reviews.text: We bought this Backup Camera Kit to add to our Toyota Tundra. We have a canopy on the truck and it gives us more confidence when backing up. My husband was able to easily install the camera and we put the monitor on a magnetic vent clip. The picture is very clear, but we haven't used the night vision yet so I didn't rate that piece. I sent the first kit back because it appeared to be used, but it must be an imperfection in the way it is made. We are glad we opted for a replacement vs just returning.
customer_reviews.author: Luvmyshoes

customer_reviews.title: Wireless did not pair!  I returned for wired camera.
customer_reviews.text: I have Blink security cameras so tried the wireless backup camera which was a waste of time. Camera did not pair with unit. I even used batteries to power camera but it still did not pair with screen unit. I also moved camera 2 feet from screen unit and still did not pair. Go with the wired camera the hardest was to penetrate engine firewall to plug in camera system to unit.
customer_reviews.author: Hal K Kamigaki

customer_reviews.title: Installed it today
customer_reviews.text: Just assembled the wiring but havent used the camera or monitor yet. Not using it as a back up camera, will use it to see into the bed of my pickup for connecting the gooseneck trailer. Did install it today, Feb 29 but installation will be on an as needed basis. It does work nicely, Will only be used to view items in the truck bed and to hitch up the gooseneck trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Okay but dreadful if backing towards lights of any kind
customer_reviews.text: Don’t ever back up towards light of any kind or you will see nothing. Also very grainy display. This thing is okay but there are better for cheaper that you can find at Autozone. Installed on 14 Jeep Wrangler. After this review the company sent me a new back up camera. It turns out the one I received was simply not functioning correctly. I have to say they have been very good in resolving the issue and I appreciate them much more than many other company's that would not have gone out of their way for customers.
customer_reviews.author: aaron finco

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 14 months before it broke.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install install mount to dashborad but wouldn't hold for long. Took a piece of plexiglass and with 2 way tape,fasten to dashboard and then mounted suction cup to plexiglass. So far, it holds. Got intermittent after 14 months of use. Wished it would have lasted longer. Bought a new one. Hope this one lasts at least 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: shalton

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to install. Does exactly what it is supposed to do. They give you plenty of cable in case you need to make longer runs. Excess cable can always be wire-tied underneath the mouldings or something like that to conceal. Camera quality is good, and I don't notice any lags. As soon as I pop into reverse, camera immediately comes on.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Reschke

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation & high quality camera!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the backup camera. It looks very upscale and solid unlike other cheap cameras out there. Good signal, gets the job done! It even comes with splice connectors, which i think was very thoughtful! Wires are decently long for the camera, and I am sure they can be extended even more for bigger trailers. Camera is not completely wireless, but you don’t have any wires in between camera and the monitor, so no need to worry about hiding all those long wires from the dash to all the way to the trunk area. For installation, I just drilled a small hole behind my license plate, took me 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Anil gurung

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I had a hell of a time getting this to work. I spent hours in the freezing cold testing different cables but couldnt get the camera to connect to the monitor display. Luckily I found the customer service email service@auto-vox.com and explained my problem. They helped me troubleshoot, but determined I had a faulty camera and battery and promptly sent me a new on. I connected the new cables and it worked this time without any fuss. Shoutouts to Joanne for helping me. My advice is if it doesn't work right away then contact auto-vox before wasting time on it. As far as the camera picture goes, its clear and crisp. Parellel parking is 100x easier.
customer_reviews.author: fivemagics

customer_reviews.title: I like it, but.....
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled to get this back-up camera installed on my 2015 Mitsubishi Outlander Sport. Had it professionally installed (1 hr, $80) and it worked perfectly for 2 days. Then it began to continue showing the writing on the display even when in reverse. That is annoying and somewhat obtrusive. I can still see what’s behind me just not as clearly because of this. It didn’t do that for two days. No idea what’s gone wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: petnanny

customer_reviews.title: Clear picture, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of this back up camera. We got this for my daughter when she turned 16 and had a car that was older than a model with an installed camera. The only problem we had with it was that it wouldn’t stick to the dash. When I let the company know, they sent me a new mount and after having had the new mount for three weeks now it has not fallen once. I would recommend this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Howerton

customer_reviews.title: Give it another try.
customer_reviews.text: The first unit must have been defective as I could not get the unit to communicate with the monitor. Sent it back. Company contacted me a replaced with another complete system. The second unit works very nicely. Image seems pretty clear. I would have liked a wider angle camera but being able to see quite a bit of the rear view is a great improvement. Thanks to representative Joanne from AutoVox for her help.
customer_reviews.author: Seabee

customer_reviews.title: Camera is dead, right out of the box, no power.
customer_reviews.text: My new backup camera didn't power up right out of the box! I bought it Nov. 19, 2019 when I was gathering supplies for the motorhome I bought. (See orders) My son went to hook this up for me and it's completely dead. Tested it right from the battery, nothing, nada. 😞 I know it's been a few months since I bought it, but it's dead, I was sold a dead product. I would like one that works, or a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Exciting

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: I use this to see behind my boat trailer when towing as my tow vehicle mirrors don't cover that area. Wired it to a cigarette lighter on the boat and the screen in the car so it remains on all the time. The connection between the two is wireless and I have left the boat in the water and went and parked the car and the connection remained, so excellent distance. Makes towing so much safer. Like it so much, I just bought another.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Wyman

customer_reviews.title: A great deal
customer_reviews.text: Really like this. the picture is crisp and clear. Easy to hook up and operate. I am really impressed with the suction cup mount for the monitor. Like the camera it works very well. Haven't experienced the night vision as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Joanne at Auto Vox helped me setup my system with two cameras. Yay!!
customer_reviews.text: I have this camera installed on my ford E250 and I am happy with it. When I bought the single camera system, it looked to me that I could add a second camera is I was willing to manually pair between two cameras. I worked with Joanne at AutoVox and she was very helpful with a reasonably priced add on camera and wiring harness. The second camera is installed on my large box trailer. While driving I can easily switch between cameras. Without the camera on the trailer, I have no view behind the trailer and the camera is a tremendous help. The install is easy if you understand 12 volt power and grounding in a vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: The Proprietor

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera. Does everything a backup camera should.
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of this camera. Super easy to install, comes with everything needed. Even the wire taps. If the joint is going to be outside the vehicle use dielectric grease but it’s a easy DIY solution. Had it installed a few weeks and it’s great. Camera is very adjustable to get the best visibility. Even mounts with 2 sided tape for easy mounting.
customer_reviews.author: turboguy327

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I did notice that when it is rainy or snowy it doesnt work great but it does work good, just seem to have abit of trouble focusing when the weather is bad, Aside from that I love it
customer_reviews.author: Jack Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective, easy install.
customer_reviews.text: Works surprisingly well and as described. I have a 4-door, short bed Dodge Ram and the signal has worked 99% of the time. The only issue I have is that the picture quality seems a bit grainy for 1080p in my opinion, but works perfectly for my needs!
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Hedrick

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations !!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install if you know basics about how to connect wires. The wireless quality of the camera is excellent. It exceeded my expectations. Took me 40 minutes to install on a pickup truck and that's because I was going slow and taking my time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a high quality product
customer_reviews.text: I work in the marine industry and use the camera on a Truck to haul boats and trailers around. The camera only lasted 5 months even though we took great care to protect it from moisture. It only works now when the receiver is right next to the transmitter
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Works great & install was easy!
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well for the price. The install was easier than expected on my Toyota Sienna and the cords were long enough for the camera and the monitor. The picture quality is definitely not HD, but it's more than clear enough to serve it's purpose. As long as the product lasts, I will buy another one in the spring for our truck.
customer_reviews.author: SiouxFan29

customer_reviews.title: Needs On Off power switch built in
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Problem is it whe co nected to an always on power connector it will run you battery down. Will have to install a switch.
customer_reviews.author: Blaze

customer_reviews.title: Amendment: Company shipped a new one. Very impressed and optimistic.
customer_reviews.text: Amendment: Just got a replacement from seller. I'm very impressed with this response to my complaint. Also, optimistic that this one will work. They clearly stand by their product. Thank you Great product if only it worked longer than 60 days! Yes, there is power: the light is on. The unit glows with a white light and the back up grid is there but no picture of surroundings. What a waste. We checked that the ground is OK. I know they will weasel out by blaming us. But the fact that it worked for 2 months is a comment on the installation.
customer_reviews.author: john ryter

customer_reviews.title: budget friendly wireless backup camera
customer_reviews.text: Camera was put on 2011 F150, camera is adjustable to see hitch or wider backup view. I don't have to get out 5x to hookup camper. Slight delay in frames, but for being wireless adding this was a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: My 3rd Auto-Vox CS-2 purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Auto-Vox CS-2 I've installed. The easy installation, decent picture and camera quality and price ($85 with instant discount) makes this purchase a no brainer. Installed on my 2011 Tundra Rock Warrior.
customer_reviews.author: BulldogDan

customer_reviews.title: Delighted
customer_reviews.text: Delighted. Easy to install and does the job very well. Highly recommended. I used utube to get the specifics for my vehicle installation and had no problem. Mfg was very responsive when I had a question
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Holly

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to install and works well. The image quality is excellent. There is sometimes a little delay in the image but backing up is normally done slowly, so that part is just fine. The mount is not as solid as I would like and sometimes a small bump will knock it out of adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Eakin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and it works the first time I am so impressed
customer_reviews.text: I will buy stock in this company. I am using the camera as a rear view out the back window of my camper. Powered up the camera went to my truck which was parked 57 feet away from camera plugged in monitor and the view out the back window of my camper came on the monitor. I was very very impressed. IF I CAN DO THIS ANYONE CAN. I will tell everyone I know how great this camera is.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN GRADY

customer_reviews.title: Works as described, and excellent support
customer_reviews.text: I did the usual product comparisons and ended up with this unit. Very satisfied with it's performance, but I did have a small failure in the electronics, perhaps due to weather exposure. I contacted the manufacturer directly and received truly exceptional support! A live person who understood the issues and worked with me through the troubleshooting, and then promptly sent me the tiny bits I needed to get back to operation.
customer_reviews.author: Chopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Being 'wireless' does not affect video quality which is excellent... Having a 96 Honda Passport with the spare tire on back gate. The tire was never a problem where I mounted the camera. below the tire.
customer_reviews.author: Gunnard Hedwall

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I was not to sure of quality based on the price. But surprisingly it works great and the picture quality is good. A little difficult to install on a rear hatchback door,(Honda Fit) but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim@cypressTx

customer_reviews.title: This system works extremely well
customer_reviews.text: This system works extremely well. Picture quality is great. The installation is very easy. Just take time to read through the instructions and layout the cabling before trying to install it. Once you clearly understand the hookup you will find it easy to install in your vehicle. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: I will recommend to anyone even my family
customer_reviews.text: Works great I'm soo happy with my purchase this backup camera system Is super simple to install anyone can do it I really like that it has almost no lag at all works super fast
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my HHR LT!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my car a 2011 Chevy HHR LT. It works perfectly and the installation was smooth as I am a former mechanic. Thank you Very much for the complete instructions that were simple to use. I completed the installation in less than a hour and was amazed by the monitor reception!! Works as described !! Perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: Donald S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a rearview camera on my travel trailer. install was a breeze, instructions were super easy to read. I havent used going down the road yet but for now it's a quality product, after I drive a across country with my trailer I'll update the review. The only detractor is the camera doesn't have an up arrow, or the ability to be digitally flipped, minor inconvenience but super easy to correct manually.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Swarts

customer_reviews.title: VERY disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Nice idea...would NOT stick to my windshield...even cleaned the windshield with alcohol and it held for a little while and after about the 6th time having fall off again I threw it in the trunk!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Camera great but suction cup mount not so much until they sent me a new one
customer_reviews.text: Camera was easy to install and works great but the section cup mount device is cheap and after 2and half months it will not stick to the window any longer and is has left a sticky mess all over the window. I reached back out to the company and a customer service representative contacted me about my concerns. Joanne sent a newly designed cup mount at no cost to me. I installed it and it is working as it was intended. Joanne followed up about satisfaction. The customer service is what will make me a return customer.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Moorefield

customer_reviews.title: Great trailer hook up aid
customer_reviews.text: Bought this system to aid in hooking up trailers on my Ford Escape. Great product. Monitor image excellent and enables me to backup to a trailer the simply step out and drop the trailer onto the ball. The only improvement that I could ask for would be a slightly greater vertical field of view. When the camera is angled to just catch the ball at the bottom there is only about 25' of rearward view.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PICTURE QUALITY NIGHT OR DAY
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy installation and great picture quality. Installed on my 2012 Honda Accord XL.
customer_reviews.author: Goldy

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Its a very good product, night vision is super clear, picture quality is amazing, camera quality is also super good. But the only thing i want to add up in the features is guide line adjustments. This is the only part missing in it and would love it more if back camera would be smaller .Rest its amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Hajra

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, until it didn’t.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, until it didn’t. The camera lasted one year, almost to the day from purchase. I was very happy with it until just stopped working. I verified the camera had good power and ground. I think I’m done with these aftermarket cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Smurf Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff isn't cheap & cheap stuff isn't good
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these back-up cameras on two of our kids' cars. My husband installed them both with no problems, and our girls love the extra security of having these on their cars! They are very well made and have a much clearer picture than the cheaper ones that are sold online. I wouldn't hesitate to purchase these again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Jarrell

customer_reviews.title: Small Screen, small camera, works great!
customer_reviews.text: The view screen is pretty small but great picture. It’s mounting design is a suction mount, but screen is so light weight I think it will hold. Camera is very small and worked very well in my application.
customer_reviews.author: OK

customer_reviews.title: Now my kids are safer
customer_reviews.text: Installed on my Dodge 4 door pickup. Wow, now I can not only see if kids or pets are hidden from my mirrors, but makes it easy to hook up to a trailer also. I can see the ball go under the hitch in perfect alignment.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Working good so far
customer_reviews.text: The camera is a little bigger than expected however setup was a breeze and it's working well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very clear
customer_reviews.text: Very clear picture. Easy to hook up. Nice and bright, easy to see. Camera angle is adjustable so you can fine tune to your vehicle. Literally took me 15 minutes to install on my Excursion . Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: dave aberle

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Easy to install. Love the fact that i didnt have to run wires to the back of my vehicle. Great picture quality. Going to get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Bnard

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I own two - one was not registering but customer service was excellent in getting a replacement camera and both work as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ziprun01

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Worked a advertised, i installed this camera in a 2014 Durango SXT that don't have the rear camera package. Was easy to install and it's working without any issues, image is clear without any blips.
customer_reviews.author: SilverRSMFJ

customer_reviews.title: Pedestal broke
customer_reviews.text: The camera works well for what I needed to do as a backup camera on my truck. But the pedestal that comes with it broke within the first week
customer_reviews.author: Traci M.

customer_reviews.title: Not Junk
customer_reviews.text: Display is completely washed out about one week after installation. Hunk of junk. Edit: Seller replaced camera at no cost. Works great! Wonderful customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Infidel

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: It’s a decent camera. I use it on my compact track loader. The picture could be better but it works pretty well
customer_reviews.author: chad777

customer_reviews.title: Adds a much need safety feature to the vehicle.
customer_reviews.text: The camera system works very well. The image is very clear on the monitor and the guide lines are quite helpful when parking. The night vision is very good and the camera picks up the area behind the vehicle well in low light conditions. This is installed on a Honda Odyssey van which is a long vehicle and it makes street parking and backing out of a space in a parking lot a much better and safer experience.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: A worth while fairly easy project.
customer_reviews.text: This camera installed very easily. The night vision is not quite as good as one might like. I'm glad I put it in. I'm thinking about putting one in my little second vehicle. The only negative I can say about it is as follows. And this comment is with respect to a rear view camera in general. It can be a bit of distraction. I mean one more device to keep an eye on.
customer_reviews.author: DonB

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: The vide0 unit wiring does not have a common type input (Mini or Micro USB, etc.) so to install with permanent wiring I have to install a hidden cigarette socket. Camera and screen work well, sharp picture even though protective film still on each. Grid line settings work well. Camera is square and chunky and ugly just like the ad looks.
customer_reviews.author: 70's boy

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Installed this on my 2012 Ford F-350 supercrew cab, works perfectly! Great picture, easy to wire. Tapped into reverse line behind tail light, mounted transmitter with vhb tape behind tail light.
customer_reviews.author: stephen eldred

customer_reviews.title: 4 out of 5
customer_reviews.text: Likes; easy to install, compact, pretty good video quality. Dislikes; suction cup mount won’t stay fixed to glass, camera mount too weak every time I go through car wash it moves it. Good by for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Camera good but install difficult
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera but installation was more difficult the described! Also the window suction cup is useless- very poor design!
customer_reviews.author: ukcat

customer_reviews.title: Great backup camera system
customer_reviews.text: Can't imagine a better backup camera system. Extremely easy install. Great Picture. I've been looking for one for a couple of years. I finally saw this one. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: William Casella

customer_reviews.title: Quality of the Picture
customer_reviews.text: Because this is an older truck, I had to make a bracket for the Monitor to sit on. But the picture is very bright and clear, even at-night! It was easy to connect the wiring to the camera and even though the camera is mounted at the rear of the truck, it still sends a good signal & picture to the monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis S. Migueles

customer_reviews.title: Backup camera
customer_reviews.text: This product is of good quality and would recommend it to anyone who needs a backup camera.
customer_reviews.author: Robert peterson Jr

customer_reviews.title: Backup camera
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and easy installation. Image is a little choppy and appears to have delays at times. Ultimately it works and does what is needed. I had a higher expectation I suppose that may have been unrealistic. Clearly not the same picture quality of factory systems.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Darby

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The camera was easy to set up and gives a clear picture. I am using it in a 2014 Chevy 1500 Crew Cab and love the fact that I didn't have to run wires to the cab of the truck. I mounted the camera above the licence plate and the wireless transceiver behind the tail light assembly and it sends a perfect picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit, reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.text: Works a lot better than I thought it would, installation was manageable for a Auto DIYER!!! Would recommend it if you CAN'T hard wire a unit Make sure the system has a bare metal ground application Ron
customer_reviews.author: Ronald W. Vantine

customer_reviews.title: Auto Vox CS2 Wireless Back up System
customer_reviews.text: The unit is easy to install and works great! It makes backing up so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Poor night vision.
customer_reviews.text: Camera was very easy to install if you are fairly handy. I thought the picture would be a little better than it is, but it will work for my purpose of hooking up to trailers. The night vision is shockingly bad and I have six bright led backup lamps on my truck. It will get the job done though.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: it does not always read the camera. Very random
customer_reviews.text: it does not always read the camera. Very random would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Wow I purchased this reverse camera I installed it on my rollback tow truck it makes backing up to non-running vehicles a breeze. Very easy to install the camera quality is very nice nice wide angle lens you can see everything while backing up the shipping was extremely fast as well I highly recommend this I will be purchasing more cameras for my other trucks
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Thomas

product_meta.title: AUTO-VOX CS-2 Wireless Backup Camera Kit with Stable Digital Signal, 4.3’’ Monitor & Rear View Camera for Truck, Van, Camping Car, SUV
feature_bullets: 【Stable and Vivid Image】With digital wireless transmission, CS-2 delivers a stable image without any interference from other signals such as Bluetooth. Equipped with a PC1058 sensor, the camera provides a vivid picture, which restores what you see behind your car directly.

【Accuracy - Top priority for parking】The bigger the camera angle is, the more image distortion you get when the angle over 110 degrees, which makes 110 degrees golden angle for parking. Together with the adjustable parking lines fit different heights camera installation place make CS-2 a trusted parking assistant.

【Ideal Camera】The waterproof standard of this camera is IP 68, the highest and lowest temperature resistance is -4°F~149°F,  and the lumen rating is 0.1 at low light night. Therefore whether it is sunny or rainy, hot or cold, day or night, the camera always performs well.

【Easy Installation】The suction cup mount allows you to install the monitor on either windshield or dashboard. And there is no wire from monitor to camera, which eliminates the tedious installation process. What’s more, because the transmitter is cleverly designed inside the camera, there is no need to install it extra. All of these simplify the installation so that you can easily install it by yourself.

【Good Service】 Auto-vox offers clear user guide (installation video), 30-day money-back guarantee and 1-year warranty. 24 hours after-sales service and Professional technician team is available via our service email.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars847 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
